TLS |} ==Features== Information on what features each of the clients support. ===General features=== For all of these clients, the concept of "HTML support" does not mean that they can process the full range of HTML that a web browser can handle. Almost all email readers limit HTML features, either for security reasons, or because of the nature of the interface.
